item.title: How do i change an object's bonus :S
item.dc:creator: @danimaster danimaster
item.description:
@danimaster wrote:

i got my server up finally:S and now i wanna change the bonus of perfect ring…how do i do that? if its in itemlist then here’s what is in it:S :

public class ItemList {
public int[] Bonuses = new int[100];
public double HighAlch;
public String itemDescription;
public int itemId;
public String itemName;
public double LowAlch;
public double ShopValue;

public ItemList(int _itemId) {
	itemId = _itemId;
}

}
